summary: This document is an FBI Laboratory evidence check-in record detailing items submitted for examination in the Criminal - Questioned Documents unit. It includes an envelope addressed to Larry Nassar and a greeting card, indicating potential evidence linking to the Epstein case or related investigations.

persons.name: Larry Nassar
persons.context: Named as the addressee on an envelope submitted as evidence to the FBI Laboratory's Questioned Documents unit.

events.title: Evidence Submission to FBI Lab
events.description: Evidence was submitted to the FBI Laboratory's Criminal - Questioned Documents unit, including an envelope addressed to Larry Nassar and a greeting card.

locations: FBI NY ECU 26 Federal Plaza NY, NY 10278
keyFacts: Evidence submitted to the FBI Laboratory included an envelope addressed to Larry Nassar, suggesting a potential investigative link between the Epstein case and Nassar.
The evidence was processed by the FBI's Criminal - Questioned Documents unit, indicating document analysis was requested.
The submission date was August 14, 2020, showing ongoing investigative activity years after Epstein's death.
The greeting card bearing writing 'Dear L.N.' suggests personal correspondence was part of the evidence.
The evidence check-in notes are part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) document collection related to the Epstein case.
